description: A massive story on how a U.S. government-bought tool can track phones at abortion clinics; a very special guest drops by to talk about The Abstract; and how we found where a Musk-funded PAC is targeting Snapchat ads.
title: Podcast: How the U.S. Government Tracks Your Phone

description: Privacy advocates gained access to a powerful tool bought by U.S. law enforcement agencies that can track smartphone locations around the world. Abortion clinics, places of worship, and individual people can all be monitored without a warrant.
title: Inside the U.S. Government-Bought Tool That Can Track Phones at Abortion Clinics
